cause.description:
This is a cause designed to educate people in the fact that we couldn't destroy the planet even if we wanted to.
The Earth has been here for billions of years. 200 years of human activity could not possibly cause irreparable damage to the environment.
Ways to maximize your carbon footprint:
Leave your computer on all the time. Set your computer to never turn off your monitor (just be sure to but a screen saver on) Stay up an hour later every night. Leave your TV on when going on a vacation (just mute it) Leave the lights in your attic/basement on Turn your thermostat up/down a degree NO FLUORESCENTS!
If you can think of any others, message me.
1. Humans could not destroy the planet even if we wanted to.
2. 200 years of human activity could not possibly cause irreparable damage to the environment
3. It is fallacious to think that humanity could un-create something that God created.
cause.mission: prove to people that it is impossible for us to destroy the Earth, no matter how much we wanted to.
cause.name: Destroy the Planet - Because You Can't
